## AlGlobalizer.expose() method

Exposes arbitrary data on a nested global property of `window`<!-- -->, using object merging to allow complex object composition or updates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static expose(name: string, data?: {
        [key: string]: any;
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | A period-delimited object path, e.g., <code>o3.state</code> or <code>al.navigation</code>. |
|  data | <code>{</code><br/><code>        [key: string]: any;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | An object to be exposed at the given location. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
